frontMatter.title: AWS re:Invent 2019 - Keynote with Dr. Werner Vogels
frontMatter.summary: Werner Vogels, CTO of Amazon.com, delivers his AWS re:Invent 2019 keynote. Watch as pulls back the covers to talk about the innovations behind AWS Nitro, Firecracker,  AWS Fargate, Amazon EBS and more.

prev.title: We introduced a memory database named scuba
prev.summary: We introduced a memory database named scuba. In this paper, the author introduces a new memory storage layout to use column-oriented storage for better compression and faster query execution strategies. they reference lots of database design include Dremel Powerdrill etc.

next.title: Going Serverless with OpenFaaS and Golang - The Ultimate Setup and Workflow
next.summary: Serverless applications have been cool and hype for a while now and some interesting and useful platforms/tools/frameworks are emerging now....
